attributes.action: Stop the building of 73 dwellings and a major relief road in Buxton
attributes.additional_details: Buxton simply cannot sustain this and this needs to be stopped. Let's stand together and stop them from ruining our beautiful little town!
attributes.background: There are plans to build 73 dwellings and a major relief road in Fairfield to be joined by a roundabout at the end of tongue Lane. This will ruin our countryside, destroy wildlife and habitats, and overrun our already struggling town. We don't have enough spaces in our schools or doctors surgeries!

rejection.details:
Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
